verses.name: Genesis 21:18
verses.text: Arise, lift up the lad, and hold him in thine hand; for I will make him a great nation.

verses.name: Genesis 21:19
verses.text: And God opened her eyes, and she saw a well of water; and she went, and filled the bottle with water, and gave the lad drink.

verses.name: Genesis 21:20
verses.text: And God was with the lad; and he grew, and dwelt in the wilderness, and became an archer.

verses.name: Genesis 21:21
verses.text: And he dwelt in the wilderness of Paran: and his mother took him a wife out of the land of Egypt.
